data.text: @freeloadingwhor @DrLeanaWen @adam_fallone @PostOpinions the mutation just enabled face saving of a worthless policy - oh this one is more transmissible so now you need a “better” mask.  What a crock. Sure the N95 is better if it’s fitted, you don’t have facial hair and you don’t adjust it.  But the previous masks still didn’t do dick

@freeloadingwhor @DrLeanaWen @adam_fallone @PostOpinions A “drug store mask is bout at Walgreens, CVS, Target etc….it’s made in China, it’s worn haphazardly, it’s pulled off dirty car seats, the pores are much larger than the virus particle sizes and it doesn’t do dick.  There is NO quant data to support these masks.

@BobCumbers666 @DrLeanaWen @adam_fallone @PostOpinions What is a “drug store mask” you are taking about? Spring of 2020 we were asked to wear a mask inside to prevent air transmission and they do a pretty good job. The N95 masks offer stronger protection since the virus has mutated (in case you forgot) and is more transmissible now

@freeloadingwhor @DrLeanaWen @adam_fallone @PostOpinions LOL - Oh December 2021 was it?! So it took over a year and a half of mask theatre, since spring of 2020 to acknowledge that drug store masks, made in freakin China, worn haphazardly, pulled off car seats, didn’t do dick?!?!?  NEVER ANY DATA TO SUPPORT DRUGSTORE MASKS. Clown show
@BobCumbers666 @DrLeanaWen @adam_fallone @PostOpinions Lol the govt recommended the K 95 masks back in December. Where have you been? The mask mandate is lifted by the way in IL

@DrLeanaWen @adam_fallone @PostOpinions Really?  A single layer cloth mask won’t do?!?!  Is this the first time you knew or stated that?!  did you ever say this before January of this year when the tied turned on public opinion ?!
@DrLeanaWen Masking in schools was abuse!  All about fear factor!!! Focus on treatment would have changed the narrative.  @P_McCulloughMD @Covid19Critical
